location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Russell, Collector at Masulipatam [Machilipatnam] to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that he has been ordered to stop paying the pension of Jaffer Ally Khan [Jafer Ali Khan], as this was also being paid by Bombay. Enclosed is a partial copy of a letter from the Civil Auditor to Russell, dated 18 July 1816, explaining this situation.
